Title: What We Do in the Shadows

Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires try to plan a lavish blood feast in honor of a visit by their ancient master from the Old Country.

Episodes.Title: City Council
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Paul Simms
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires get embroiled in local Staten Island politics as their first step to world domination.

Episodes.Title: Werewolf Feud
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Josh Lieb
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The fragile truce between the vampires and Staten Island's werewolves is tested; Colin Robinson finds romance with a new coworker.

Episodes.Title: Manhattan Night Club
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Tom Scharpling
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires venture into Manhattan, to make an alliance with an old friend who is now the king of the Manhattan vampires.

Episodes.Title: Animal Control
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Duncan Sarkies
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Laszlo, in bat form, is captured by Staten Island Animal Control and must be rescued, while Nadja can no longer resist reconnecting with her reincarnated lover Gregor.

Episodes.Title: Baron's Night Out
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Iain Morris
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The Baron awakens from his slumber and demands to experience the wonders of the New World in a night out in the town.

Episodes.Title: The Trial
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires must defend themselves as an international vampire tribunal gathers to judge them for their transgressions.

Episodes.Title: Citizenship
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Stefani Robinson
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Nadja trains Jenna on how to take her first victim, and Nandor applies for American citizenship.

Episodes.Title: The Orgy
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Marika Sawyer
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Tensions run high as the vampires prepare to host the Biannual Vampire Orgy.

Episodes.Title: Ancestry
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Stefani Robinson
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Nandor visits one of his living descendants; a lover from Nadja's past reemerges.
